document.title: Evaluating a metric over an archive.

paragraph.heading: 1Evaluating a metric over an archive.
paragraph.paragraph:
In the metric tool, evaluating a metric over an archive is not different from evaluating it over another and more classical scope(see
/tools/eiffelstudio/how_to_s/70_analyzing_a_project/10_computing_a_measure/10_calculating_a_measure.xml calculating a measure for further details). The only difference is that you have to precise an archive file for that calculation.
